alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 9:39PM PST until January 20 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Isolated areas of freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Ephrata, Quincy, and Moses Lake. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
